Regina offers specialized antique appraisal services through auction houses and certified professionals covering furniture, art, jewelry, books/vintage collections (**notable authors**: Agatha Christie/Rudyard Kipling), vehicles (**collector cars**), estatesales evaluations ($100â€“$300+/hour typical pricing).
